text:
## How to add file submissions as learning objects?

John would like to add a file submission as a learning object. Now let’s see
how John will add the file submission in Curricula.

1\. In Curricula, John clicks **Course** on the left navigation pane, and
finds his course.

2\. John clicks **Configure** and he can see the learning paths that he
configured.

3\. He locates an existing content group or create a new one, and then clicks
the learning object type **File Submission**.

4\. John wants to set this as a group collaboration task, so he selects
**Group** in **Audience type** , fills in other required information, and then
clicks **Save**.

***Note** : Once John has enrolled learners to this course, he will assign
these learners to different groups. All file submissions of the **Group**
audience type share the same grouping logic defined at the course level.
